import React from "react"; import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom"; import {auth} from './../../firebase/firebase.utils'; const MenuLogin = ({ currentUser }) => { return (
    {currentUser !== null ? ( <>
  • Cześć   {currentUser.email}!
  • Załóż konto
  • Oddaj-rzeczy

  • Zaloguj

) } export default MenuLogin;
